actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to sell or exchange the Gulfport Research Laboratory and other Forest Service administrative sites in the States of Mississippi, to provide for a new research facility, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to sell or exchange specified tracts of land in Mississippi, including the Gulfport Research Laboratory, for: (1) construction of a research laboratory and office facility at the Mississippi State University Forest Service administrative site at Starkville, Mississippi; and (2) acquisition of National Forest System land and administrative facilities in Mississippi.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to sell or exchange the Gulfport Research Laboratory and other Forest Service administrative sites in the States of Mississippi, to provide for a new research facility, and for other purposes.
